attributes.action: reduce the VAT on petrol to 5% for over 10 years
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This petition is a formal request on behalf of the british public to significantly reduce the VAT on petrol prices for over 10 years.
